entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Makkovik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:42 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Makkovik Airport 11:00 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure: 99.6 kPa
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -2.7°C
Wind: SE 36 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
